text: Almazbek Sharshenovich Atambayev (, Almazbek Şarşenoviç (Şarşen uulu) Atambayev; born 17 September 1956) is a Kyrgyz politician. He was the President of Kyrgyzstan from 1 December 2011 to 24 November 2017. He was Prime Minister of Kyrgyzstan from 17 December 2010 to 1 December 2011 and from 29 March 2007 to 28 November 2007. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Kyrgyzstan Category:Prime Ministers of Kyrgyzstan
title: Almazbek Atambayev
